channel.title: Elysium - Azure Based
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/855958/Elysium.png[/img]
No Point keeping this, this isn't my actual version of this, (This was the one that wasn't a Project that was purposely added with tuts, The reason was to give people a boost on azure, well I can certainly say It's not too late NOW Please bare in mind this is a found copy of the source, I don't know if it's actually got half the features listed, all features listed are tutorials, so I may continue adding on, This is simply for the lazy.
Hello and welcome to Elysium-Server before we go any further I would like to give some credits out to the following people -
BFMV - of google (Server Base) Satan666 - of google (Slayer Base) Cyb3r - of google (gaining XP in combat.) Mod Dabe A - of Elysium-Server (Everything else.) Knova - of google (Bug Fixes) Purehit - of google (Helped me fix a dupe.)# blakeman8192 - of google (Wasn't for him Azure wouldn't of come around so big credits to him)
Features already in the server when downloaded: Npcs Banking Shopping (Going to re-do completely.) Trading Npc dieing and respawning dialogues Teleporting (Going to start working on Lunar teleports & loading 474/508 Maps) glory teleporting sounds Combat (Started to edit it & Tommorow I will start on Mage & Range.) More packets (weight, energy, ect) One click actions (click on npc and waits till it is at it's distance to do action) XML loading for data (Unsure if I want to load via XML or MySql.) Accounts use Data Input/Output stream Packets are a lot more organized and uses an array. No more Client.java Player and Npc classes extend Entity. (Like it should be!) Uses Hyperion's container system! Prayer is bugged, just the config ids are incorrect cba to find them. But other then that it works (re-doing as found below.) A pending items system basically you sent the pending items index and the amount when you want items to be sent to a player incase of lost items anywhere you could do: pendingItems[0] = 4151; pendingItemsAmount[0] = 2; And when a player logs in he/she will get those items. If they don't have enough slots they talk to a banker to get them. (Connecting it too MySql soon.)
[B]Media (was in base when downloaded):[/B] [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj255/Augustburnsred15/Azure%20317/Untitled3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj255/Augustburnsred15/Azure%20317/Untitled.png[/img][IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj255/Augustburnsred15/Azure%20317/Untitled2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj255/Augustburnsred15/Azure%20317/nd3h9f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj255/Augustburnsred15/Azure%20317/rky3ns.png[/img] [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj255/Augustburnsred15/Azure%20317/szcq48.png[/img] [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj255/Augustburnsred15/Azure%20317/2qmg67c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj255/Augustburnsred15/Azure%20317/t7oab9.png[/img]
Slayer (Thanks to Satan666 again for the base, still needs no more then 184 of the same NPC and saving the task I added more NPCs to it my self, So I take no credit for this) Fletching Crafting Prayers & Bone Burying Lose items on death Item Requirements (still adding more as I go along) Thieving RuneCrafting (Still working on multiple Runes and finding IDs for Alters) Emotes (Including SkillCapes) NPC drops (Loaded from file, May use satans666 way to load throught XML) MySql (Can connect but cannot load passwords yet.) Herblore All Dupes & Bug fixes that I'm aware of (Thanks to Satan, Knova, BFMV, My self.)
So why am I making Elysium-Server, Because I have finally realised how bad Project Insanity, Witch is why I'm going to heavily edit Azure & I may release at the end of it.
This will not be a RuneScape remake as far I can see it going is into a Beta before either released as a server or developed a little longer, If it is developed longer the chances is it's going to be a real server, I am contradicting my self here, as this is a side project for when I'm bored of coding my Real PI Project witch is a Remake.
Slayer: [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2nleeqr.jpg[/img]
SkillCapes: [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2evvl9k.jpg[/img]
Fletching: Cutting the Log. [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/25k6emf.jpg[/img]
Fletching: Stringing the Bow: [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/309jxb6.jpg[/img]
Fletching: Making Arrow Shafts: [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/6p57hj.jpg[/img]
How to train & level: [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/29f8llt.jpg[/img][/SPOILER] [/CENTER]
[CENTER]Thanks for looking, As I said Idk what this is I logged in and yeah, it has combat & slayer and such downloads:
[URL=http://"http://uppit.com/nmypmgrh5nwn/Elysium_Azure_based.rar"]Elysium Azure based - Packaged[/URL]
Enjoy - Kinky-Whip of Mopar/ Dave of google / Sir Dave of R-S
[SIZE="5"][B][U]Too make your self Admin please do ::editor ingame, Type your name in then change rights using that ;) < Inb4howdoImakeMyselfAdmin, When you've made this into a proper server remove the command and make the server load from txt or get .dat editor.[/U][/B][/SIZE]
[/CENTER]

Yeah, I had this Idea when I was working on my real Azure source, if I put all tuts into one Azure source, and released (not as my own work), it would boost the ammount of people using Azure, people don’t use it cuz there too lazy to work on it.

item.title: Elysium - Azure Based
item.dc:creator: @kinky_whip kinky whip
item.description:
@kinky_whip wrote:

[CENTER]

No Point keeping this, this isn’t my actual version of this, (This was the one that wasn’t a Project that was purposely added with tuts, The reason was to give people a boost on azure, well I can certainly say It’s not too late NOW Please bare in mind this is a found copy of the source, I don’t know if it’s actually got half the features listed, all features listed are tutorials, so I may continue adding on, This is simply for the lazy.

Hello and welcome to Elysium-Server before we go any further I would like to give some credits out to the following people -

BFMV - of google (Server Base)
Satan666 - of google (Slayer Base)
Cyb3r - of google (gaining XP in combat.)
Mod Dabe A - of Elysium-Server (Everything else.)
Knova - of google (Bug Fixes)
Purehit - of google (Helped me fix a dupe.)#
blakeman8192 - of google (Wasn’t for him Azure wouldn’t of come around so big credits to him)

Features already in the server when downloaded:
Npcs
Banking
Shopping (Going to re-do completely.)
Trading
Npc dieing and respawning
dialogues
Teleporting (Going to start working on Lunar teleports & loading 474/508 Maps)
glory teleporting
sounds
Combat (Started to edit it & Tommorow I will start on Mage & Range.)
More packets (weight, energy, ect)
One click actions (click on npc and waits till it is at it’s distance to do action)
XML loading for data (Unsure if I want to load via XML or MySql.)
Accounts use Data Input/Output stream
Packets are a lot more organized and uses an array.
No more Client.java Player and Npc classes extend Entity. (Like it should be!)
Uses Hyperion’s container system!
Prayer is bugged, just the config ids are incorrect cba to find them. But other then that it works (re-doing as found below.)
A pending items system basically you sent the pending items index and the amount when you want items to be sent to a player incase of lost items anywhere you could do:
pendingItems[0] = 4151;
pendingItemsAmount[0] = 2;
And when a player logs in he/she will get those items. If they don’t have enough slots they talk to a banker to get them. (Connecting it too MySql soon.)

Media (was in base when downloaded):


nd3h9f.png813×572

rky3ns.png813×572

szcq48.png813×572


Slayer (Thanks to Satan666 again for the base, still needs no more then 184 of the same NPC and saving the task I added more NPCs to it my self, So I take no credit for this)
Fletching
Crafting
Prayers & Bone Burying
Lose items on death
Item Requirements (still adding more as I go along)
Thieving
RuneCrafting (Still working on multiple Runes and finding IDs for Alters)
Emotes (Including SkillCapes)
NPC drops (Loaded from file, May use satans666 way to load throught XML)
MySql (Can connect but cannot load passwords yet.)
Herblore
All Dupes & Bug fixes that I’m aware of (Thanks to Satan, Knova, BFMV, My self.)

So why am I making Elysium-Server, Because I have finally realised how bad Project Insanity, Witch is why I’m going to heavily edit Azure & I may release at the end of it.

This will not be a RuneScape remake as far I can see it going is into a Beta before either released as a server or developed a little longer, If it is developed longer the chances is it’s going to be a real server, I am contradicting my self here, as this is a side project for when I’m bored of coding my Real PI Project witch is a Remake.
